Okay I understand 
Don't worry about it 

Just wait until you feel ready to ask her
Think some time to figure out whether or not your feelings are genuine 

But don't let it stress you out 
If it starts to really freak you out, not knowing how she feels about you, you need to ask her 

Again though, not trying to force you
